doc:
Bella Darvi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bella_Darvi 0 Bajla Węgier (October 23, 1928 – September 11, 1971), better known as Bella Darvi, was a Polish film actress and stage performer who was active in France and the United States. Bajla_Węgier ( October_23_,_1928 – September_11_,_1971 ) , better_known as Bella_Darvi , was a_Polish_film_actress_and_stage_performer who was active in France and the_United_States .
